# AttributeAlignment.ReplaceWidth method

Make an AttributeAlignment with the same name but different width from the old one.

```csharp
public static AttributeAlignment ReplaceWidth(AttributeAlignment old, int alignWidth)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| old | An old attributeAlignment to use name from |
| alignWidth | New width |

## Return Value

A new AttributeAlignment with name from old.Name but with new width
